author: Special Correspondent
text:
The members of the students’ wing of the Tamil Manila Congress staged a demonstration on Anna Salai on Saturday in connection with the suicide of Rohith Vemula, the research scholar who committed suicide at University of Hyderabad.

The protest was held in front of the Head Post Office around 11 a.m.

Demands

The students demanded a CBI inquiry into the death; a compensation of Rs. 50 lakh to the family of Vemula and action against those who drove him to end his life, sources said.

They were detained at a hall in Chintadripet and were released later.
title: Vemula suicide: students’ wing of TMC seeks CBI probe
